name: Leap, Frog!
description:
GOAL:

Collect all letters of the phrase Leap, Frog!

Dodge Arrows, Spikes, and the Bottom of the Screen

CONTROLS:
Hold your Thumb/Mouse Button on the screen to charge up your Leap

Drag your Thumb/Mouse to reposition your launch path
